description: A svelte yet spacious choice for stowing gear up front or off the saddle, the Swift Industries Catalyst pack is ideal for bikes with narrower bars and shallower head tube tolerances.
name: Catalyst Pack

specs.value: Shell: ECOPAK EPLX400; lining: packcloth; flap lining: waterproof TPU-coated ripstop nylon; telescoping neck: RBC; lash tab: Coverlight; sheath: batten; body insert: HDPE
